CustomField.formula: IF( ISNULL( Opportunity.Estimated_Billed_Date__c ) ,0,IF(ISPICKVAL( Charge_Type__c,"Rental or Lease"), (TotalPrice * CASE( MONTH(Opportunity.Estimated_Billed_Date__c ) , 1,3, 2,2, 3,1, 16-MONTH( Opportunity.Estimated_Billed_Date__c ))) ,0))
CustomField.label: AOP Rental or Lease
